alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 3:28AM MST until March 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Storm total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Platte County including Wheatland and Chugwater. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions possible due to icy, snow packed roads and low visibilities in falling and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An estimated 2 to 4 inches has already fallen through the early morning hours. Expect an additional 3 to 6 inches through Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County
